user_question: Can you find a unique dessert recipe that uses lavender and generate an image of it?
final_answer: Lavender honey ice cream recipe: 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup whole milk, 0.75 cup honey, 2 tbsp dried lavender, 5 egg yolks. Image of lavender honey ice cream generated. To infuse lavender flavor, steep the dried lavender in the milk and cream mixture for 30 minutes before straining.
